string_data: check failed - There is an inconsistency in the article regarding the gender of the protester. The text refers to "a protester" and uses male pronouns ("he", "his"), but when describing Katie Boulter's match being disrupted by jigsaw puzzle pieces, it implies this was the same incident. However, the images and captions consistently show what appears to be an elderly man, but the final image caption refers to "The protestor wears a white Just Stop Oil t-shirt as he is dragged away by security" while the earlier description of the jigsaw puzzle incident doesn't clearly establish this was the same person/incident. The narrative flow suggests these might be different incidents but doesn't clearly distinguish them, creating confusion about whether there were multiple protests or one incident being described inconsistently.
